content:
您好 ${name}

欢迎使用视频会议服务


网页登录或终端注册

登录网页进行会议预约和控制

网址：${firstNetIp()} ${webNetType()}

<% if (isDualNet) { print """

${webAddress.extranet} ${webNetType()}

"""} %>

账号：${username}

密码：${password}

SIP终端注册

服务器地址：${enterpriseDomain}

用户名：${username}

密码：${password}

代理服务器：${firstSipIp()} ${sipNetType()}

<% if (isDualSipNet) { print """

${sipAddress.extranet} ${sipNetType()}

"""} %> <% if (h323Enable) { print """

H.323终端注册

网守地址：${enterpriseDomain}

H.323号码/名称：${username}

网守鉴权名：${username}

网守密码：${password}

代理服务器：${firstH323Ip()} ${h323NetType()}

"""} %> <% if (isDualH323Net) { print """

${h323Address.extranet} ${h323NetType()}

"""} %>

如需帮助，请联系管理员。


团队

www.hhh.com.cn
subject: 账号信息
script:
<%

netTypeFlag = 1;
def netTypeDisplay(boolean isDual) {
 if(isDual && netTypeFlag == 1) {
  netTypeFlag++;
  return "(内网) ";
 }
 if(isDual && netTypeFlag == 2) {
  netTypeFlag = 1;
  return "(外网) ";
 }
""
}

def singleIp(String extranet,String intranet,Boolean extranetEnable,Boolean intranetEnable) {
if(extranetEnable && !intranetEnable) {
return extranet;
}
if(!extranetEnable && intranetEnable) {
return intranet;
}
""
}

isDualNet = webAddress.extranetEnable && webAddress.intranetEnable;
firstNetIp = "";

def singleNetIp() {
singleIp(webAddress.extranet, webAddress.intranet, webAddress.extranetEnable, webAddress.intranetEnable)
}

def firstNetIp() {
firstNetIp = isDualNet ? webAddress.intranet : singleNetIp();
firstNetIp
}

def webNetType() {
netTypeDisplay(isDualNet)
}

def webValidDomain(){
 return isDualNet ? webAddress.extranet : singleNetIp();
}

isDualSipNet = sipAddress.extranetEnable && sipAddress.intranetEnable;
firstSipIp = "";

def singleSipIp() {
singleIp(sipAddress.extranet, sipAddress.intranet, sipAddress.extranetEnable, sipAddress.intranetEnable)
}

def firstSipIp() {
firstSipIp = isDualSipNet ? sipAddress.intranet : singleSipIp();
firstSipIp
}

def sipNetType() {
netTypeDisplay(isDualSipNet)
}


isDualH323Net = h323Enable && h323Enable && h323Address.extranetEnable && h323Address.intranetEnable;
firstSipIp = "";

def singleH323Ip() {
singleIp(h323Address.extranet, h323Address.intranet, h323Address.extranetEnable, h323Address.intranetEnable)
}

def firstH323Ip() {
firstH323Ip = isDualH323Net ? h323Address.intranet : singleH323Ip();
firstH323Ip
}

def h323NetType() {
netTypeDisplay(isDualH323Net)
}

h323DualEnable = h323Enable && isDualH323Net;
def h323DualEnable(){
h323DualEnable
}
%>
rule: 当管理员新增创建用户账号后，点击发送邮件。
name: 发送用户账号帐号信息
originContent:
您好 ${name}

欢迎使用视频会议服务


网页登录或终端注册

登录网页进行会议预约和控制

网址：${firstNetIp()} ${webNetType()}

<% if (isDualNet) { print """

${webAddress.extranet} ${webNetType()}

"""} %>

账号：${username}

密码：${password}

SIP终端注册

服务器地址：${enterpriseDomain}

用户名：${username}

密码：${password}

代理服务器：${firstSipIp()} ${sipNetType()}

<% if (isDualSipNet) { print """

${sipAddress.extranet} ${sipNetType()}

"""} %> <% if (h323Enable) { print """

H.323终端注册

网守地址：${enterpriseDomain}

H.323号码/名称：${username}

网守鉴权名：${username}

网守密码：${password}

代理服务器：${firstH323Ip()} ${h323NetType()}

"""} %> <% if (isDualH323Net) { print """

${h323Address.extranet} ${h323NetType()}

"""} %>

如需帮助，请联系管理员。


${mailSignatureTeam}

${mailSignatureUrl}

content:
您好，

您被邀请参加这场视频会议！

主题：${escape_subject()}

时间：${startDateTime} ~ ${endDateTime} ${timeZone}

<% if (isNotEmptyLocation()) { print """

地点：${location}"""} %>

会议号码：${conferenceNumber}

密码：${password}

<% if (isNotEmptyRemark()) { print """

备注：${remark}"""} %>

加入视频会议：

<% if (webRtcEnable) { print """

${index()}) 点击此处网页入会 ${webNetType()}

"""} %> <% if (isDualNet) { print """

点击此处网页入会 ${webNetType()}"""} %>

${index()}) 使用已注册的设备，可一键入会或直接拨打会议号码。

<% if (ipCallEnable) { print """

${index()}) 也可以拨打服务器域名或IP地址，根据语音提示输入会议号码和会议密码，并以#号键结束。服务器域名或IP地址：

${domainOrIpList()}

"""} %> <% if (ipCallEnable) { print """

${index()}) SIP会议室系统，请拨打

   ${conferenceNumber}**${password}@${firstSipIp()} ${sipNetType()}

"""} %> <% if (isDualSipNet) { print """

   ${conferenceNumber}**${password}@${sipAddress.extranet} ${sipNetType()}

"""} %> <% if (isH323Enable) { print """

${index()}) H.323会议室系统，请拨打

   ${conferenceNumber}**${password}@${firstH323Ip()} ${h323NetType()}

"""}%> <% if (h323DualEnable) { print """

   ${conferenceNumber}**${password}@${h323Address.extranet} ${h323NetType()}

"""} %> <% if (sfbEnable) { print """

${index()}) Skype for Business (Lync)： ${webAddress.extranet}/user/extend/mail/sfb?code=${sfbJoinCode}

"""}%> <% if(liveBroadcastEnable) { print """

${index()}) RTMP直播：点击此处观看直播

   或扫描二维码观看直播：

"""}%> <% if(liveBroadcastEnable) {if (isNotEmptyLiveBroadcastDescription()) { print """

   活动详情：${liveBroadcastDescription}"""}} %>


团队

www.hhh.com.cn
subject: ${subject}
script:
<%
index = 1;

pwd = password==null || password=="" ? "":"**"+password+"";

isNotEmptyLocation = location != null && location != "" ? true : false;

isNotEmptyRemark = remark != null && remark != "" ? true : false;

isNotEmptyPassword= password != null && password != "" ? true : false;

def isNotEmptyPassword() {
isNotEmptyPassword
}

def isNotEmptyRemark() {
isNotEmptyRemark
}

def isNotEmptyLocation() {
isNotEmptyLocation
}

def escape_subject(){
subject
}

def pwd(){
pwd
}

netTypeFlag = 1;
def netTypeDisplay(boolean isDual) {
 if(isDual && netTypeFlag == 1) {
  netTypeFlag++;
  return "(内网)";
 }
 if(isDual && netTypeFlag == 2) {
  netTypeFlag = 1;
  return "(外网)";
 }
""
}

def singleIp(String extranet,String intranet,Boolean extranetEnable,Boolean intranetEnable) {
if(extranetEnable && !intranetEnable) {
return extranet;
}
if(!extranetEnable && intranetEnable) {
return intranet;
}
""
}

isDualNet = webAddress.extranetEnable && webAddress.intranetEnable && webRtcEnable;
firstNetIp = "";

def singleNetIp() {
singleIp(webAddress.extranet, webAddress.intranet, webAddress.extranetEnable, webAddress.intranetEnable)
}

def firstNetIp() {
firstNetIp = isDualNet ? webAddress.intranet : singleNetIp();
firstNetIp
}

def webNetType() {
netTypeDisplay(isDualNet)
}

isDualSipNet = sipAddress.extranetEnable && sipAddress.intranetEnable && ipCallEnable;
firstSipIp = "";

def singleSipIp() {
singleIp(sipAddress.extranet, sipAddress.intranet, sipAddress.extranetEnable, sipAddress.intranetEnable)
}

def firstSipIp() {
firstSipIp = isDualSipNet ? sipAddress.intranet : singleSipIp();
firstSipIp
}

def sipNetType() {
netTypeDisplay(isDualSipNet)
}

isH323Enable = h323Enable;
isDualH323Net = h323Enable && h323Address.extranetEnable && h323Address.intranetEnable;
firstSipIp = "";

def singleH323Ip() {
singleIp(h323Address.extranet, h323Address.intranet, h323Address.extranetEnable, h323Address.intranetEnable)
}

def firstH323Ip() {
firstH323Ip = isDualH323Net ? h323Address.intranet : singleH323Ip();
firstH323Ip
}

def h323NetType() {
netTypeDisplay(isDualH323Net)
}

h323DualEnable = h323Enable && isDualH323Net;
def h323DualEnable(){
h323DualEnable
}

def webValidDomain(){
 return webAddress.extranet;
}

def index(){
index++
}

def domainOrIpList() {
secondSipIp = isDualSipNet ? "; " + sipAddress.extranet : "";
h323Ip1 = h323Enable ? firstH323Ip() + "" : "";
h323Ip2 = h323DualEnable ? "; " + h323Address.extranet : "";
domainOrIpList = "SIP: " + firstSipIp() + secondSipIp + "";
if(h323Enable) {
domainOrIpList = domainOrIpList + "\n"+"H.323: " + h323Ip1 + h323Ip2;
}
domainOrIpList
}
%>
rule: 预约视频会议，完成预约后，发邮件通知参会人。
name: 预约视频会议
originContent:
您好，

您被邀请参加这场视频会议！


主题：${escape_subject()}

时间：${startDateTime} ~ ${endDateTime} ${timeZone}

<% if (isNotEmptyLocation()) { print """

地点：${location}

"""} %>

会议号码：${conferenceNumber}

密码：${password}

<% if (isNotEmptyRemark()) { print """

备注：${remark}

"""} %>


加入视频会议：

<% if (webRtcEnable) { print """

${index()}) 点击此处网页入会 ${webNetType()}

"""} %> <% if (isDualNet) { print """

点击此处网页入会 ${webNetType()}

"""} %>

${index()}) 使用已注册的设备，可一键入会或直接拨打会议号码。

<% if (ipCallEnable) { print """

${index()}) 也可以拨打服务器域名或IP地址，根据语音提示输入会议号码和会议密码，并以#号键结束。服务器域名或IP地址：

${domainOrIpList()}

"""} %> <% if (ipCallEnable) { print """

${index()}) SIP会议室系统，请拨打

   ${conferenceNumber}**${password}@${firstSipIp()} ${sipNetType()}

"""} %> <% if (isDualSipNet) { print """

   ${conferenceNumber}**${password}@${sipAddress.extranet} ${sipNetType()}

"""} %> <% if (isH323Enable) { print """

${index()}) H.323会议室系统，请拨打

   ${conferenceNumber}**${password}@${firstH323Ip()} ${h323NetType()}

"""}%> <% if (h323DualEnable) { print """

   ${conferenceNumber}**${password}@${h323Address.extranet} ${h323NetType()}

"""} %> <% if (sfbEnable) { print """

${index()}) Skype for Business (Lync)： ${webAddress.extranet}/user/extend/mail/sfb?code=${sfbJoinCode}

"""}%> <% if(liveBroadcastEnable) { print """

${index()}) RTMP直播：点击此处观看直播

   或扫描二维码观看直播：

"""}%> <% if(liveBroadcastEnable) {if (isNotEmptyLiveBroadcastDescription()) { print """

   活动详情：${liveBroadcastDescription}

"""}} %>

${mailSignatureTeam}

${mailSignatureUrl}
